directions: Cook and stir onion, garlic, and water in a skillet over medium heat until tender, about 5 minutes. Add tuna, Worcestershire sauce, and steak seasoning; mix briefly to combine. Add the barbeque sauce. Simmer on low heat to allow the flavors to combine, about 5 minutes.
Spread butter on soft rolls. Heap tuna mixture onto the rolls and serve.
title: BBQ 'Pulled' Tuna Sandwich
